channel.title: Runserver
channel.description:
I'm having a problem with my Runserver.bat file. Sometimes the file doesn't actually run the server.
For example: I run my server the first time, it works. I edit a few things, compile, and restart my server. I try running my server again, the Runserver.bat has no errors, but when I try logging in, I can't connect. 'Error Connecting To Server'
I've restarted my client and my RunServer file, and it still wouldn't run. Anyone know how to resolve this?

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

or maybe run the compile.bat after editing…
unless your runsever and compiler is in one but either or compile after editing.
(even though running the server without the compile will run the server from the last compilation)

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @Ikilivion Ikilivion
item.description:
@Ikilivion wrote:

I’ve had the same problem a few times, it’s usually an error that’s not been tracked down. It’s also sometimes the fact that your batch file was opened after the client was opened. You could try starting your batch file, then starting your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @The_Forgottn The_Forgottn
item.description:
